mapper.select: /*시설관리자가 후기 조회*/ SELECT r.review_cd AS reviewCd ,r.pay_cd AS payCd ,r.goods_ctg_cd AS goodsCtgCd ,r.user_id AS userId ,r.review_detail AS reviewDetail ,r.review_score AS reviewScore ,r.review_reg_date AS reviewRegDate ,fg.facility_cd AS facilityCd ,f.facility_nm AS facilityNm FROM review AS r INNER join pay AS p on r.pay_cd = p.pay_cd INNER join goods_order AS o on p.order_cd = o.order_cd INNER join facility_goods AS fg on o.facility_goods_cd = fg.facility_goods_cd INNER join facility AS f ON f.facility_cd = fg.facility_cd WHERE r.user_id = #{userId};
